00021 //ui stuff for gcode2model
00022 
00023 #include "gcode2Model.h"
00024 #include <ostream>
00025 #include <assert.h>

00027 #include <QKeySequence>
00028 #include <QtGui>
00029 #include <QProcess>
00030 
00031 using std::cout;
00032 gcode2Model::gcode2Model()
00033 {
00034         myMenu = new QMenu("gcode2Model");
00035         theWindow->menuBar()->insertMenu(theWindow->getHelpMenu(),myMenu);
00036 
00037         //these five lines set up a menu item.  Uncomment the second one to have a shortcut.
00038         myAction = new QAction ( "gcode2Model", this );
00039         myAction->setShortcut(QString("Ctrl+M"));
00040         myAction->setStatusTip ( "gcode2Model" );
00041         connect ( myAction, SIGNAL ( triggered() ), this, SLOT ( myMenuItem() ) );
00042         myMenu->addAction( myAction );
00043 
00044 // do next: show segments one at a time
00045         nextAction = new QAction ( "Do next", this );
00046         nextAction->setShortcut(QString("Ctrl+."));
00047         nextAction->setStatusTip ( "Do next" );
00048         connect ( nextAction, SIGNAL ( triggered() ), this, SLOT ( myNextMenuItem() ) );
00049         myMenu->addAction( nextAction );
00050 
00051         hasProcessedNgc = false;
00052         thePath.Nullify();
00053 };
00054 
00055 void gcode2Model::myMenuItem()
00056 {
00057         bool success;
00058         cleanUp();
00059         hideGrid();
00060         axoView();
00061         
00062         QString file = QFileDialog::getOpenFileName ( theWindow, "Choose .ngc file", "./ngc-in", "*.ngc" );
00063         if ( ! file.endsWith(".ngc") ) {
00064                 infoMsg("You must select a file ending with .ngc!");
00065                 return;
00066         }
00067         success = interpret ( file );
00068         if (success) {
00069                 cout << "sweeping..." << endl;
00070                 sweep();
00071                 fitAll();
00072                 hasProcessedNgc = true;
00073         } else {
00074                 infoMsg("Interpreter stopped without finding PROGRAM_END.");
00075                 drawSome(-1);
00076                 showWire();
00077                 fitAll();
00078         }
00079 }
00080 
00081 // show one or more segments
00082 void gcode2Model::myNextMenuItem() {
00083         static uint segment = 0;
00084         if (!hasProcessedNgc) return;
00085         drawSome(segment);
00086         segment++;
00087 }
00088 
00089 void gcode2Model::sleepSecond() {
00090         //sleep 1s and process events
00091         //cout << "SLEEP..." << endl;
00092         QTime dieTime = QTime::currentTime().addSecs(1);
00093         while( QTime::currentTime() < dieTime )
00094                 QCoreApplication::processEvents(QEventLoop::ExcludeUserInputEvents, 100);
00095         return;
00096 }

00111 void gcode2Model::cleanUp() {
00112         feedEdges.clear();
00113         slotNeutralSelection();
00114         last.SetCoord(0,0,0);
00115         firstPoint = true;
00116         CANON_PLANE = CANON_PLANE_XY;
00117 }
